name: Blog Manager WP
author: wpdiscover

sections.description:
Blog Manager is a good handy and free solution for everyone who is looking for a responsive blog page with the website. Blog Manager provides you with a variety of 8 different blog templates to setup your blog page for any WordPress websites. Sometimes, we always stick with one blog layout as per theme, but it’s not easy to change or modify only blog layout very easily, only you can do it by modifying code and css files.

However, using Blog Manager plugin you can design your blog page as per your choice to give it a WOW factor. Also you can modify various settings very quickly from admin side as Blog Manager plugin has User Friendly Admin Panel. So, beginners can start blogging within 5 minutes, no coding skill required.

You can show your new blog page design with any page via below shortcode.

Shortcode : [wp_pbsm] – To display blog on page

Links

  • Documentation
  • Support Forum

Check our Blog Manager plugin demos

  • Blog Manager [Free]– Blog Manager WP Demo
  • Blog Manager Pro [Pro]– Blog Manager WP PRO Demo

** Free Plugin Features **

  • Creating 6 Blog Designs with shortcodes,
  • Add unlimited posts,
  • Timeline Layout,
  • Auto-generated shortcodes to easily embed a blog,
  • Fully responsive design.

** Pro Plugin Features **

  • 35+ cool designs
  • Create better blog layout inside your WordPress website.
  • List and Magazine Blog Manager Layout
  • Grid and Masonry Blog Manager Layout
  • Slider Blog Manager Layout
  • You can create Archive Layouts
  • In the Archive layout you can use author setting
  • You can create Single Layouts
  • Single post settings, Post navigation settings and Related post settings.
  • Pagination and Load More features available
  • Social share setting and 10+ designs
  • Blog Manager Filter Category and Tag Management – Separate your blog post with specific category and tag.
  • Mobile Compatibility View
  • Add default image with media settings
  • Elementor, Beaver and SiteOrigin Page Builder Support. New
  • Divi Page Builder Native Support. New
  • WP Templating Features
  • Custom CSS
  • Fully responsive
  • 500+ Font family
sections.installation:
1. Upload the entire blog-manager-wp folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Create blog layout and copy its shotcode.
  4. Now paste its shortcode to any page.

Need Support

You can create support ticket on org forum.

Translators

Please contribute to translate our plugin. Contact at wordpress.org support forum.

short_description: Allows you to create and modify your blog page with 6 unique blog layouts. A quick and easy way to change blog page designs with so easy steps.
